# Terms and Descriptions by Chapter

## Chapter 1 Terms

```{r}
library(pander)
glossary <- read.csv("~/R project/LDAGlossary/csv/Glossary.csv", header=TRUE,
                       na.strings=c("."), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
table1.1 <- cbind(glossary[1:20, 1], glossary[1:20, 2])
pander(table1.1)
```

## Chapter 2 Terms

```{r}
table1.2 <- cbind(glossary[20:33, 1], glossary[20:33, 2])
pander(table1.2)
```
